txt.en:
Saruman's sorcery destroyed the Deeping Wall and has driven the disorganized, retreating Rohirrim into the Deeping-coomb.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Commander defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Soldier defeated
- Banner burned
Hold the Deeping-coomb while the Rohirrim retreat into the Hornburg and Glittering Caves
Aragorn, EÃ³mer, Gamling, Gimli, and Legolas must survive
